name: GPTPullRequestReview
description: This task use OpenAi GPT model to review PullRequests
author: Mustapha Larhrouch

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Api key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Api key of OpenAi or Azure OpenAI.

inputs.name: aoi_endpoint
inputs.label: Azure OpenApi Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure OpenApi Endpoint, leave empty to use default endpoint. (optional)

inputs.name: support_self_signed_certificate
inputs.label: Support self-signed certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to support self-signed certificate.

inputs.name: prompt_instructions
inputs.label: prompt instructions for auto the code review
inputs.defaultValue: Act as a code reviewer of a Pull Request, providing feedback on the code changes below. You are provided with the Pull Request changes in a patch format.             Each patch entry has the commit message in the Subject line followed by the code changes (diffs) in a unidiff format.
inputs.helpMarkDown: use to set instructions for your reviewer will be injected into your system prompt

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: OpenAI model
inputs.helpMarkDown: use to set the model to use

inputs.name: max_token
inputs.label: OpenAI Token Max Length
inputs.helpMarkDown: use to set the max length for a result
